title: Disney's haunted Halloween
brief_description: Goofy learns from an animated Jack O’Lantern that Halloween is a great time to find out about old time holiday traditions and superstitions. Looks at why people dress in costumes and how “trick” or “treating” started. The program also contains appropriate warnings about cautious behaviour during such a festive time.
